Curator's comments: For grave 113, see C. M. Firth, ‘Archaeological Survey of Nubia, 1908-9’ (Cairo, 1912), 11, pl. 37b. nos. 7-9. Also from this burial: beads (1912,1109.92). Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (381)
